title: Shinyuu to Watashi no Suki na Hito
sinopse:
She was her best friend and he was her first love... she didn't plan to change that. Ayu and Kaho were friends since kindergarten. They were the exact opposite and even if both them were cute, they hated men. But one day, Kaho found someone she loved.

(Source: Chibi Manga)

Included one-shots: ...Suki., Zutto Zutto Daisuki
